blockquote.para: The process to have the next openSUSE release has opened to the public with the release of the first Milestone. Our admin caf4926 started a thread a while ago, and it's a good thing to give it some attention here. Please be warned: Milestone releases are for testing purposes, not for production use. On the other hand: if you want to test, go ahead, and help the community by doing so. The roadmap to openSUSE 12.1 -yep, that's what it's going to be versioned- is here

blockquote.title: Some other Milestone
blockquote.para: On the 2nd of June the openSUSE Forums passed the milestone of 1.000.000 posts....A big cheers to all who made this possible !!!

The Forums Team welcomes the new branch on the tree: the chinese language subforums. We now host the following language specific subforums under the umbrella of the openSUSE Forums: Main forums, english 中文(Chinese) Nederlands (Dutch) Français (French) Deutsch (German) Ελληνικό (Greek) Magyar (Hungarian) 日本語 (Japanese) Portuguese Pусский (Russian)
